articles.title: Apple supplier Jabil plans $500M venture to build AI data centers

articles.title: Trump says he'll extend TikTok sale deadline for third time
articles.content: President Trump on Tuesday said he'll likely extend the TikTok sale deadline a third time, keeping the app online.

articles.content: Apple shares have underperformed peers in 2025, falling over 20% amid trade war and tariff concerns. Click here to read an analysis of AAPL stock now.

articles.title: Wall Street Lunch: Kraft Heinz To Ditch Artificial Colors
articles.content: Kraft Heinz announced it will not launch any new products in the U.S. with Food, Drug & Cosmetic colors, effective immediately.
